data.title: The Simpsons Movie
data.meta_description: It takes a wide screen to fully capture Homer Simpson's stupidity, and The Simpsons Movie does it.  In the eagerly-awaited animated feature film based on the hit TV series, Homer must save the world from a catastrophe he himself created.  (20th Century Fox)
data.text:
Summary It takes a wide screen to fully capture Homer Simpson's stupidity, and The Simpsons Movie does it. In the eagerly-awaited animated feature film based on the hit TV series, Homer must save the world from a catastrophe he himself created. (20th Century Fox)

Directed By: David Silverman

Written By: James L. Brooks, Matt Groening, Al Jean, Ian Maxtone-Graham, Mike Scully, John Swartzwelder, Matt Selman, Jon Vitti, Mike Reiss, David Mirkin, George Meyer

Summary It takes a wide screen to fully capture Homer Simpson's stupidity, and The Simpsons Movie does it. In the eagerly-awaited animated feature film based on the hit TV series, Homer must save the world from a catastrophe he himself created. (20th Century Fox)
